column1: The Purple Pig////The highlights were definitely the chicken in the cacciatore
column3: and the pasta was really good as a whole! The chicken fell off the bone and was extremely tender
column4: the pasta was perfectly al dente
column5: and everything in general was very flavorful. The portion sizes were fine and we spread out all the food across maybe two-ish meals each. They give you one salad box per person but everything else just comes in one container.
